metadata.h1: Got Room for Dessert? See the 2025 Olive Garden Menu! 🍰
metadata.description: You HAVE to see the Olive Garden Dessert Menu! 🍰 From Chocolate Lasagna to Tiramisu, we've got the scoop on every sweet treat and price. See it now! 👇

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: You can't leave Olive Garden without dessert, it's basically a rule! 😉 Their dessert menu is the perfect way to end your meal on a high note. Whether you're a chocolate fiend or love a classic Italian sweet, there's a treat with your name on it. Let's dig in! 🥄

DESSERTS.description: Go on, treat yourself! These desserts are legendary for a reason. From rich chocolate cakes to classic Italian tiramisu, you can't go wrong. ✨

items.name: Chocolate Lasagna (V)
items.review: Layers of chocolatey, creamy goodness. This isn't just a dessert, it's an experience. An absolute must for any chocolate lover. 🍫

items.name: Black Tie Mousse Cake (V)
items.review: So fancy, so delicious! This cake is pure elegance. Rich chocolate cake, creamy cheesecake filling... what's not to love? 🤵

items.name: Tiramisu (V)
items.review: Save room for this! 🍰 Creamy, coffee-soaked ladyfingers and a dusting of cocoa. It's light, it's airy, and it's the perfect sweet ending to your meal. An Italian classic done right.

items.question: Can I just go to Olive Garden for dessert?
items.answer: Totally! You can pop in just for dessert anytime. Whether you're dining in or grabbing takeout, your sweet tooth is always welcome. 🥳

items.question: What dessert should I not skip at Olive Garden?
items.answer: If there’s one dessert to order, it’s the Black Tie Mousse Cake. Layers of rich chocolate cake, creamy cheesecake, and silky mousse make it a must-try. If you're a chocolate lover, the Chocolate Lasagna is also a legendary choice!

items.question: Are there any gluten-free desserts?
items.answer: Yep! Olive Garden usually has a gluten-free option like a Flourless Chocolate Torte. Just ask your server for the latest gluten-sensitive sweet treats!

items.question: How many calories are in the Black Tie Mousse Cake?
items.answer: The Black Tie Mousse Cake has 750 calories of pure, delicious indulgence. Worth it! 😉
